CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 28, 1945, pg. 1, reads: "Educator - As a reward for his work among Negroes as a member of the Intercultural Committee of the Board of Education, Dr. John H. Morgart, principal of Herron Hill Junior High School, received one of the five citations at the Business and Professional Association's Pittsburgh PRogress Contest banquet here this week. Dr. Morgart is very active in affairs affecting Negroes. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Herron Hill Junior High School principal Dr. John H. Morgart, wearing dark three piece suit, seated behind desk in office interior
